text: Coline Serreau (born 29 October 1947) is a French actress, director and screenwriter. She is known for directing the Academy Award-nominated comedy movie Three Men and a Cradle (1985). ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1947 births Category:Living people Category:French movie actors Category:French television actors Category:French stage actors Category:Actors from Paris Category:Movie directors from Paris Category:Movie producers from Paris Category:Writers from Paris Category:French screenwriters
title: Coline Serreau
